comment._content: Thank you for sharing this beautiful picture.  It's amazing.

comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: "Fred Hardie was company photographer for G. W. Wilson & Co. of Aberdeen Scotland, the largest view photographers in the world. Over 500 Australian views were taken, the negatives to which are now held by Aberdeen University."--Collection General Notes

comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called St Mary’s Cathedral, Sydney, and we'd love to have this added to the group!
